name: Warbirds Spitfire
description:
Warbirds-Spitfire is a 3d WWII air combat game, a flight sim with accelerometer control, photo-realistic scene, and battle missions based on true history.


----------------------------------------
-- F E A T U R E S
----------------------------------------
* Control your fighter with accelerometer.
* Realistic flying control with full 360 degree of pitch/roll/yaw.
* Battle take place in photo-realistic scene.(Please check the screenshot)
* Universal App, Support Retina Display.
* Accurate 3D model for major aircrafts in missions.
* Dogfight with enemy fighter.
* Intercept large enemy bomber raids.
* 4 different view mode (Clear/Cockpit/External/follow)
* Campaign missions based on true history of 7 Spitfire ACEs.
(Full version has 24 missions, lite version has 4 missions)
* HTML Documents for Spitfire history, spec, and ACE stories.
* Full user manual for how to fly, dogfight and bomber interception.
* Competible with Fling, tactile game controller for iPhone/iPad.
( http://tenonedesign.com/fling.php )

With a little practice you sure can handle it.

----------------------------------------
-- H I S T O R Y
----------------------------------------
The Supermarine Spitfire is a British single-seat fighter aircraft used by the Royal Air Force and many other Allied countries throughout the Second World War. It was produced in greater numbers than any other British aircraft and was the only Allied fighter in production throughout the war.

All the missions are based on true history of Spitfire ACEs.

Lite version has 4 missions for J E "Johnnie" Johnson.
Full version has 24 missions for 7 ACEs, they are:
J E "Johnnie" Johnson ( 4 missions )
Douglas Bader ( 6 missions )
R S "Bob" Tuck ( 3 missions )
George Beurling ( 2 missions )
A G "Sailor" Malan ( 2 missions )
Alan Deere ( 4 missions )
C F Gray ( 3 missions )
